intro: Heliotropium kunzii, commonly known as the rock heliotrope, is a flowering plant native to arid and semi-arid regions of Africa and the Middle East. Heliotropium kunzii is often found growing on rocky soils and is adapted to thrive in conditions of low rainfall and high temperatures.
